comment.author: 44581421@N08
comment._content:
Opposite St. Paul's Church, Sketty, Swansea, is the school house, later renamed the Stewart Hall. Replaced later by Sketty School on Tycoch Road in 1909 (now awaiting a new use - hurry please Swansea City Council) and Parklands School, Sketty Park in the late 1960s.
It's now been converted into flats, more's the pity. I had a few snogs outside the Stewart Hall at discos in the '80s!
